column1: #Text=And I 'm proud of the fact that the folks in Zionsville took the ball and ran with it .
#Text=I was honored to work with then state representative Jim Buck , from Kokomo , who also represented Zionsville .
#Text=And I represented ... at the time , not Zionsville .
#Text=It was n't until afterwards that Zionsville became part of my area .
#Text=The Town Hall chambers in Zionsville is the former Methodist church where Beth and I got married in .
#Text=When we had this ceremony of this dissolution of Eagle and Union Townships and the creation of the new town of Zionsville .
#Text=It literally happened right where we got married .
#Text=And I was asked to speak right in the same place where I exchanged my wedding vows with my wife .
#Text=I got up to speak and I was nervous and stammering a little bit and they 're like " Senator is everything ok ?
